subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement I: Group 13 trivalent halides get easily hydrolysed by water due to their covalent nature. Statement II: 3 upon hydrolysis in acidified aqueous solution forms octahedral 2 O 6 3 + ion.

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but statement II is false
(2) Statement I is false but statement II is true
(3) Both statement I and statement II are false
(4) Both statement I and statement II are true
